Class CardCollection

java.lang.Object
CardCollection
public class CardCollection extends Object
This class encapsulates an collection of playing cards.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected Card[]
    cards
    The array that holds the cards.
    protected String
    label
    The label naming this collection.
    static int
    MAXSIZE
    The maximum size of a collection of cards.
    protected int
    numFilled
    The number of cards currently in this collection.

  • Method Details

    • addCard

      public void addCard​(Card card)
      Add the specified card to an array of cards, if it is not full.
      Parameters:
      card - the card

    • top

      public Card top()
      Return (but do not remove) the top card from the collection.
      Returns:
      the top card (or throw exception if the collection is empty).

    • discard

      public Card discard()
      Removes the "top" card from a collection, assuming one exists.
      Returns:
      the last card in array of cards, or throw exception if empty

    • size

      public int size()
      Return the number of cards in this collection.
      Returns:
      the number of cards in the collection

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Determine if the card collection is empty or not.
      Returns:
      true if the collection is empty, and false otherwise
